summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1965, for the improvement of East Spruce Street, from Twenty-eight Avenue to Twenty-ninth Avenue, and Twenty-eighth Avenue from Yesler Way to East Spruce Street, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, with concrete or brick gutters, concrete curbs with armoured concrete corners, and by the construction of concrete sidewalks, all necessary water mains, sewers and side sewer connections, under Ordinance No. 20370, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
